mapper.insert: insert into wb_send_info (main_id, main_title, main_type, wb_id, wb_idstr, wb_mid, wb_created_at, create_time) values (#{mainId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mainTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wbIdstr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wbMid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wbCreatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
